title: Music-Based Children’s English Learning Instructional Design Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic English grammar and vocabulary knowledge, no music education experience
context.additional_context: Environment enabling smartphone-based VR content utilization, providing math teachers with training linked to children's English teaching methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for acquiring over 50 children’s English vocabulary items using music activities.
Learners design grammar instruction plans (e.g., simple present tense, imperative sentences) utilizing rhythm patterns and melodies.
Learners execute music-integrated lesson scenarios at least three times in smartphone-based VR simulation environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
